| History                 = The army of dead warriors who inhabited the mighty hall [[Valhalla (Afterlife)|Valhalla]] and who pass their time in feasting and continual fighting, as they wait for the final battle at [[Ragnarok (Event)|Ragnarok]], when they will turn out to fight on behalf of the Aesir.{{r|Thor #154}}

When [[Surtur (Earth-616)|Surtur]] used the [[Cask of Ancient Winters]] to cross over from [[Muspelheim]] with his demon hordes the Einherjar alongside, the U.S. Military and the [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]] drove them back. The Einherjar were so impressed by modern weapons the military used they took some machine guns back with them.{{r|Thor #350|353}}  

Later [[Hela (Earth-616)|Hela]] began taking mortal souls to Hel and [[Thor Odinson (Earth-616)|Thor]] enlisted the help of the Einherjar to help him stop her. They along with [[Balder Odinson (Earth-616)|Balder]] and the [[Skurge (Earth-616)|Executioner]] traveled to Hel and after many hardships including an heroic last stand by the Executioner managed to defeat Hela and free the trapped souls.{{r|Thor #362}}
